title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice

questions.question: What does Shelley think Chandler would be perfect for?
options: A blind date with a woman
A blind date with a man
questions.correct_answer: A blind date with a man
questions.explanation: Shelley thought Chandler would be perfect for a date with a man named Lowell.

questions.question: What is Ross's initial reaction when he finds out Nana has passed away?
options: He screams and runs out of the room
He stays calm and tries to comfort his family
He is in denial and thinks it's a mistake
He is relieved that she is no longer suffering
questions.correct_answer: He stays calm and tries to comfort his family
questions.explanation: Ross tries to stay calm and support his family after hearing the news about Nana's passing.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe return the pencil to Rachel?
options: Because it was the wrong color
Because it didn't feel like her friend Debbie's presence
Because she didn't like the brand
questions.correct_answer: Because it didn't feel like her friend Debbie's presence
questions.explanation: Phoebe returns the pencil because it didn't give her the same feeling as when she uses a specific yellow pencil that reminds her of her friend Debbie.

questions.question: What is Joey doing at the funeral?
options: He is playing a musical instrument
He is watching a football game on a portable TV
questions.correct_answer: He is watching a football game on a portable TV
questions.explanation: Joey is secretly watching a football game on a portable TV during the funeral.

questions.question: What does Ross take from his mother's closet?
options: A dress for Nana to wear
A pair of shoes to match the dress
questions.correct_answer: A box of Sweet 'n' Lo's
questions.explanation: Ross finds a box of Sweet 'n' Lo's in his mother's closet while looking for shoes to match Nana's dress.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's strange behavior at the wake?
options: He has had too much to drink
He took some of his mother's pain pills
He is trying to make a joke
questions.correct_answer: He took some of his mother's pain pills
questions.explanation: Ross took some of his mother's pain pills, which causes him to act strangely and become loopy.

questions.question: What does Monica's mother say about her hair?
options: That her ears are not her best feature
That she should cut it shorter
questions.correct_answer: That her ears are not her best feature
questions.explanation: Monica's mother comments that her ears are not her best feature, implying that she should wear her hair down to cover them.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Chandler meets at the wake?
questions.correct_answer: Andrea
questions.explanation: Chandler meets a woman named Andrea at the wake, who is Dorothy's daughter.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when he is under the influence of the pain pills?
options: That she is his best friend
questions.correct_answer: That he loves her
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that he loves her when he is under the influence of the pain pills.

questions.question: What is the significance of the earrings Monica is wearing?
options: They were a gift from her boyfriend
They were a gift from her mother
They were a gift from Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: They belonged to Nana
questions.explanation: The earrings Monica is wearing belonged to Nana, and her mother comments on how nice they look on her.

questions.question: What does Lowell say about Chandler?
options: That he has a certain quality
That he is out of his league
That he is not his type
questions.correct_answer: That he is not his type
questions.explanation: Lowell tells Chandler that he doesn't have a certain quality that he and his friends look for in a partner.

questions.question: What is the name of the person Shelley thinks Chandler would be perfect for?
questions.correct_answer: Lowell
questions.explanation: Shelley thinks Chandler would be perfect for a blind date with a man named Lowell.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her mom and her friend Debbie?
options: That they are both alive and well
That she gets a strong feeling that they are with her
That she never thinks about them
questions.correct_answer: That she gets a strong feeling that they are with her
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that she gets a strong feeling that her mom and her friend Debbie are with her, especially when she uses a certain yellow pencil.

questions.question: What is the reason for the nurse's surprise at Nana's death?
options: That Nana came back to life after being declared dead
questions.correct_answer: That Nana came back to life after being declared dead
questions.explanation: The nurse is surprised because Nana came back to life after being declared dead, which is a rare occurrence.

questions.question: What does Monica's father want to do when he dies?
questions.correct_answer: Be buried at sea
questions.explanation: Monica's father wants to be buried at sea, which he thinks would be a fun and unique experience for his family.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he falls into the open grave?
options: He gets up and walks away
questions.correct_answer: He realizes his worst fear
questions.explanation: Ross falls into an open grave and realizes that it is his worst fear come true.

questions.question: What is the name of the person who gives Ross the pain pills?
questions.correct_answer: His mother
questions.explanation: Ross's mother gives him the pain pills that he takes, which causes him to act strangely.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Lowell about Brian?
options: That he is out of his league
That he is perfect for him
That he is not his type
questions.correct_answer: That he is out of his league
questions.explanation: Chandler says that Brian is out of his league, implying that he is not good enough for him.

questions.question: What is the significance of the photo of Nana and the gang at Java Joe's?
options: It is a photo of Nana's wedding
It is a photo of Nana's birthday
questions.correct_answer: It is an old photo
questions.explanation: The photo of Nana and the gang at Java Joe's is an old photo from 1939, which shows Nana and her friends having fun.

questions.question: What does Monica say about her grandmother?
questions.correct_answer: That she was very critical
questions.explanation: Monica says that her grandmother was very critical, which made it difficult for her mother to grow up with her.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he is trying to get the dress for Nana?
options: He opens a drawer and climbs into the closet
He uses a ladder to reach the top shelf
questions.correct_answer: He opens a drawer and climbs into the closet
questions.explanation: Ross opens a drawer and climbs into the closet to try to find a dress for Nana.

questions.question: What is the name of the coffee shop where Nana and the gang took a photo?
questions.correct_answer: Java Joe's
questions.explanation: The photo of Nana and the gang was taken at Java Joe's, which was a coffee shop they used to frequent.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she is checking on Ross after he falls into the grave?
options: She checks if his muscle is in spasm
She tries to pull him out
questions.correct_answer: She checks if his muscle is in spasm
questions.explanation: Phoebe checks if Ross's muscle is in spasm after he falls into the grave, which shows her concern for his well-being.

questions.question: What is the score of the football game that Joey is watching?
questions.correct_answer: Giants 17, Cowboys 14
questions.explanation: Joey is watching a football game between the Giants and the Cowboys, and the score is Giants 17, Cowboys 14.

questions.question: What does Monica's mother say about her grandmother's criticism?
options: That it was something she got used to
That it was something she avoided
questions.correct_answer: That it was something she got used to
questions.explanation: Monica's mother says that she got used to her grandmother's criticism, which implies that it was a regular occurrence.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Chandler when he is under the influence of the pain pills?
options: That he is his best friend
questions.correct_answer: That he loves him
questions.explanation: Ross tells Chandler that he loves him when he is under the influence of the pain pills.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who is watching the football game with Joey?
questions.correct_answer: Mr. Geller
questions.explanation: Mr. Geller is watching the football game with Joey, which shows that he is also interested in the game.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Brian at the end of the episode?
options: That he is out of his league
That he is perfect for him
That he is not his type
That he could get him if he wanted to
questions.correct_answer: That he could get him if he wanted to
questions.explanation: Chandler says that he could get Brian if he wanted to, which shows his confidence in his ability to attract someone like Brian.

questions.question: What is the significance of the Sweet 'n' Lo's in Nana's closet?
options: They were a gift from someone
They were something she stole from restaurants
questions.correct_answer: They were something she stole from restaurants
questions.explanation: The Sweet 'n' Lo's in Nana's closet were something she stole from restaurants, which shows her mischievous personality.
